    • News

    Here's an example we created that you might use for displaying the latest posts or news items on your site. It uses HTML5 elements such as article. We've obviously styled the HTML inline content a little and have added media queries so the content doesn't become ridiculously large.

    HTML Markup

    <section id="news-demo">
  <article>
    <div class="text-content">
      <h2>Article title</h2>
      <p>Some text intro to this thing that happened sometime</p>
      <a href="#!" class="button-link">read more</a>
    </div>
    <div class="image-content">
      <img src="/images/image-1.jpg" alt="demo1_1">
    </div>
  </article>
  <article>
    <div class="text-content">
      <h2>Article title</h2>
      <p>Some text intro to this thing that happened sometime</p>
      <a href="#!" class="button-link">read more</a>
    </div>
    <div class="image-content"><img src="/images/image-2.jpg" alt="demo1_1"></div>
  </article>
  <article>
    <div class="text-content">
      <h2>Article title</h2>
      <p>Some text intro to this thing that happened sometime</p>
      <a href="#!" class="button-link">read more</a>
    </div>
    <div class="image-content">
      <img src="/images/image-3.jpg" alt="demo1_1">
    </div>
  </article>
</section>

    jQuery

    jQuery('#news-demo').slippry({
  // general elements & wrapper
  slippryWrapper: '<div class="slippry_box news-slider" />',
  elements: 'article',

  // options
  adaptHeight: false,

  // pager
  pagerClass: 'news-pager',

  // transitions
  transition: 'horizontal',
  useCSS: true,

  // slideshow
  autoDirection: 'prev'
});

    CSS (created by Sass)

    /* News */
.news-slider {
  /* Style the actual content */
}
.news-slider .text-content {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  padding: 1em;
  width: 30%;
  height: 100%;
}
.news-slider .text-content p {
  margin: 1em 0;
}
.news-slider .text-content a.button-link {
  padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
  float: right;
}
.news-slider .image-content {
  line-height: 0;
}
.news-slider .image-content img {
  max-width: 100%;
}
.news-slider .pager {
  /* change the pager */
  text-align: right;
}
.news-slider .pager li {
  margin: 0 0 0 1em;
  -webkit-border-radius: 0;
  -moz-border-radius: 0;
  -ms-border-radius: 0;
  -o-border-radius: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
.news-slider .pager li a {
  text-indent: 9999px;
  -webkit-border-radius: 0;
  -moz-border-radius: 0;
  -ms-border-radius: 0;
  -o-border-radius: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
